problem_text_cn: 如图,直线AB与直线CD相交于点O,MO⊥AB,垂足为O.已知∠AOD=136°,则∠COM的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the line AB and the line CD intersect at the point O, MO ⊥ AB, and the foot of perpendicular is O. Given that ∠AOD = N_0, then the degree of ∠COM is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查对顶角和垂线的定义,掌握对顶角相等是解题的关键,注意由垂直可得到角为90°.
